title: Changing the Dairy Industry by Perfect Day

tasks.task: The users describe the founders of Perfect Day sharing their journey from eating animal products to becoming vegan, and their solution to creating dairy products without animals using biotechnology.
subtasks: Founders explain their background and paths to becoming vegan (starting as vegetarians, then fully vegan).
Discuss the inefficiency and environmental impact of animal agriculture, particularly in relation to global climate change.
Address demand for animal protein and its growth, including rising middle classes in developing countries.
Introduce Perfect Day's technology using yeast to convert sugar into milk protein through fermentation.
Highlight the nutritional benefits and functionality of dairy proteins from a biotech source compared to plant-based alternatives.
Explain the company's approach to addressing the dairy industry's potential limitations and consumer trends toward reducing animal protein.

tasks.task: Founders announce an ingredient-centric strategy for Perfect Day's dairy proteins beyond traditional dairy products.
subtasks: Describe scaling their impact beyond individual consumer choices to disrupt the trillion-dollar dairy market.
Discuss partnership opportunities with food industries to develop innovative plant-based alternatives while tackling global challenges.
Emphasize the desire to continue satisfying consumer preferences for dairy products without compromising on sustainability, nutrition, or experience.
